üîé Inside the Strategy Blueprint: What We Uncover

Six Critical Visibility Factors

1.

What Prospects Are Really Asking LLMs

This isn't just about 'best X' lists. We analyze the entire discovery journey ‚Äî from first pain point to final vendor choice. We surface the exact prompts your prospects are asking inside LLMs.

2.

How You Show Up When Buyers Ask AI

We run dozens of real prompts across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Perplexity to test if you appear in recommendations, how you compare to competitors, and what's influencing the answers.

3.

What the AI Models Know About You

We assess core brand data, review signals, media credibility, metadata, boilerplate, and structured information. Outdated or inconsistent data means you don't get recommended.

4.

Whether You're an Entity They Can Trust

We check Google Knowledge Panel status, entity resolution on LinkedIn, Crunchbase, G2, Wikidata, and on-site schema. If LLMs don't recognize you as credible, you're not on the shortlist.

5.

What's Influencing the Answers ‚Äî and Where You're Missing

We map the real sources shaping recommendations: high-authority listicles, review hubs, blogs, forums. Sites that mention your competitors ‚Äî but not you.

6.

A Full Digital Authority & Reputation Pulse

We scan domain authority and backlinks, presence and ratings on trusted review platforms, and consistency across key citations and descriptions.
